short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ribbon Reminder - Stay on top of every task, right from your toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of every task, right from your toolbar. Ribbon Reminderâ€™s badge counter lets you add, edit, and delete tasks instantly. 

Simply tie or untie tasks to update your count - because everyone could use a little backup. It's like tying a ribbon on your finger.
